objects.text:
Stylish Distressed Denim Design
Premium Braided Leather Handles
Detachable Shoulder Strap
Matching Wristlet Included

product_details.name: Denim Tote Bag for Women Top Handle Satchel Purse Boho Shoulder Handbags with Wristlet
product_details.description: Package Dimensions: 14.88 x 11.42 x 2.91 inches; 2.27 Pounds. Department: Women. Country of Origin: China. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 110 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a fashion product presentation with a modern and clean design. Dominated by cooler tones and accentuated with earthy leather hues, the layout includes a prominent, eye-catching main heading (`heading`) in bold blue font. A stylish subheading (`subheading`) in warm brown follows below to describe the product category. Supporting product features are listed with a neat font (`description`) to the left. A bold product price (`price`) is displayed in large lettering for quick visibility. At the bottom, a strong call-to-action (`cta_button` & `cta`) stands out with a brown button and white text. A centered, high-resolution product image (`product_image`) anchors the design, while elegant background lines and borders enhance structure.

**Color Palette:**
- Blue: #345995 (Primary headings and outlines)
- Warm Brown: #A67C52 (Subheading and CTA button)
- White: #FFFFFF (Background and CTA text)
- Dark Gray: #333333 (Description text)
- Light Gray/Off White: #F5F7FA (Background fill)
product_color: This product image showcases a stylish denim handbag accented with brown leather elements. The dominant color palette includes denim blue shades, distressed textures blending from light blue (#B0C4DE) to deep indigo (#1C3D5A), and a rich chestnut brown leather (#8B4513). The frayed denim pattern creates visual depth, while the brown leather handles and label offer a bold contrast, giving structure and elegance. These complementary tones are well-balanced, with the texture enhancing the blue variety and the leather detailing emphasizing sophistication. For an advertisement banner, a palette of muted denim blues, tan beige (#D2B48C), and dark brown would perfectly mirror the product’s aesthetic.
